aboutLombok: Located in the province of West Nusa Tenggara and is one of the islands that has a variety of tours, especially with its amazing natural wealth in Indonesia, starting from tours of Mount Rinjani, Gili Trawangan, and there are still many beaches with various kinds of beauty.
aboutBandung: Bandung is one of the historical cities in Indonesia. The city nicknamed Paris van Java has a myriad of tourist destinations worth visiting, such as the Ciwidey White Crater, Dago Village to Lembang.
aboutYogyakarta: The Special Region of Yogyakarta is located in the southern part of the island of Java, bordering the province of Central Java. The attractions of this city can be said to be divided into three, palace tours, batik shopping, and culinary tours.
aboutSurabaya: The city of Surabaya is the second largest city in Indonesia as well as being the capital of East Java Province. Even though it has the status of a metropolitan city, Surabaya still has a variety of natural beauties that are suitable as a vacation spot with the family, such as the Mangrove Botanical Garden, Kenjeran Beach and the Grand Forest Park.
aboutJakarta: Tourist attractions in Jakarta offer a million city center charms. Not only modern tourism, but historical, cultural and natural tourism which is suitable for family tours on weekends.
aboutAmbon: Despite its small size, the island of Ambon still offers many experiences for the adventurous. From exploring the charming Ambon City, hiking through the lush tropical vegetation, there are plenty of undiscovered gems for visitors to enjoy.
aboutPapua: Papua which is located in Eastern Indonesia is the starting point for many people who want to visit the natural beauty of Indonesia. Travelers come here for all kinds of adventures. You can start from the remote Baliem Valley, or simply capture the magic of Lake Sentani and its culture on camera.
aboutBali: The island of Bali is a beautiful small island and part of the Indonesian archipelago, and Indonesia's most famous tourism in the world. It has a unique panorama and culture that makes this island exclusive from the others. In addition, the location is in a tropical situation as a Dream Island for vacation. The island of Bali has many interesting places such as rice fields, beautiful panoramas, volcanoes, tourism activities and attractions.
aboutPadang: Famous throughout Indonesia for its signature cuisine. Padang is the place to sample the famous spicy padang rice dishes that have spread across the country and the world, including delicacies such as rendang, beef jerky and satay padang. Padang also has stunning natural beauty because it is directly adjacent to the Indian Ocean and has a variety of topography and landscapes.
aboutMakassar: Makassar is the Gateway to Eastern Indonesia, as well as the entry point for adventurous tours to the highlands of Tana Toraja, where stunning mountain views and the unique rituals of the Toraja people await. Only 50 km from the city, Bantimurung Bulusaraung National Park will welcome you with its stunning waterfalls and enchanting swarms of butterflies.
